name: Asteroids AGAIN
description:
It's just like the original Asteroids by Atari, AGAIN! Play it now on your PC.

--Controlls--

Arrow Keys - Move

Space Bar - Fire

"R" Button - Restart the Game

"Escape" Key - Quit the Game

Keep in mind, this game is not finished! It is still in development! This is merely an early access version. Follow us so that you can know exactly when the full version comes out!
